Title: The Great Shokhari
Description:
Of all da animals I have seen here, Shokahri, da great sky vixen, be da most proud.

It be a shame she preyed on a gnoll shaman, cause now she be crazed with decay. When I saw her eating one of her kits, I knew something was not right.

I took da kits away and brought them here, but Shokhari attacked me, swiping me good. I almost didn't make it.

Shokhari must be put down. If da decay rots more of her mind, she be coming for us soon.
PortraitGiverText: This once magnificent slyvern ruled these forests is now crazed with Decay.
RewardText:
Oh, it be a sad time for me, but it had to be done. 

Here, take one of Shokhari's kits. I can't keep dem all. Carin' for dem be the least we can do. 

Raise it well.
